name: Friday Night Funkin' Golden apple! algebra Full fight! (just one fight)

description:
this is the agebra full fight and music with swapping characters and btw you might be wondering... why did you made this if the game already made it.... well i just made it for fun and this is a game... (scratch game) and if the web version doesn't work then download the html anyways now the controls
